module: Module-level comment: The 'ex3_top' module takes a 10-bit input from SW[9:0] switches and drives three 7-segment displays: HEX0, HEX1, and HEX2. It uses instances of 'hex_to_7seg' module (SEG0, SEG1, SEG2) to convert SW inputs into 7-segment outputs, with HEX0 displaying SW[3:0], HEX1 displaying SW[7:4], and HEX2 displaying SW[9:8].
